name: Scale Dunk
description:
=> Scale Dunk !

This is the most interesting puzzle game in this season!
Scale Dunk is also the funniest way to train your brain!
All things in Scale Dunk: SIMPLE, SMART, ATTRACTIVE and FOR FREE.

=> How To Play ?

Really simple, just use your brain to handle the move the slicer to scale the ball.
Find the best way to scale your ball in small area and get diamonds.
Use your diamonds to exchange another item in game like new style for ball.
If your ball touch on Slicer 3 times, you will be lose your life.
Look at the Top Board and see your rank with your friends.

=> Scale Dunk, Why not ? Lets try now!
And see how long, how far, how diamonds you can GET and you can GO !
